FACETS.name: AntiForensics
FACETS.description: Any techniques that erase processing history of image manipulations

FACETS.name: FaceManipulation
FACETS.description: Any manipulation done to a face (including GAN)

FACETS.name: GAN
FACETS.description: Any operations that use GAN-based techniques locally/globally

FACETS.name: Laundering
FACETS.description: Disguise the original ownership or source of the media via characteristic feature tampering

FACETS.name: Physical
FACETS.description: Add shadows or sources of reflection that were not originally present

FACETS.name: Recapture
FACETS.description: Recapture an image through a digital photo of a picture or screen shot

FACETS.name: Reformat
FACETS.description: Changing the media compression or file format

FACETS.name: SeamCarving
FACETS.description: Resize an image while preserving the integrity of content
